data.title: Lucy Liu Dishes on Her Roles in "Charlie's Angels" and "Kill Bill"
data.meta_description:
This episode originally aired during season 3 of The Drew Barrymore Show.




Drew is joined by her friend “Shazam: Fury of the Gods” star Lucy Liu and she’s dishing on some of her iconic roles like “Charlie’s Angels” and “Kill Bill.” Drew and Ross Mathews are covering the hottest headlines at the news desk, like why Dolly Parton says she doesn’t ride rollercoasters and the film center in New Jersey showcasing the Barrymore family.
data.text:
Known world-wide for her infectious brand of humor and positivity, host Drew Barrymore shares her undeniably relatable point of view while celebrating every part of humanity along the way. Drew’s creating a movement to march in the army of optimism with a multi-topic format, elevating, inspiring and entertaining in every segment from human interest stories to happy news to lifestyle segments and celebrity guests. Hear full episodes of The Drew Barrymore Show adapted for your ears every day.

The Drew Barrymore Show listeners can use discount code "DREW20" for 20% off all The Drew Barrymore Show products on ParamountShop.com.

Check your local listings to watch The Drew Barrymore Show on cable or stream it on Paramount+.
